TopicTitle: Chris Hadfield "Space Sessions: Songs from a Tin Can"

Articles.Content:
He's really milking this whole Astronaut thing isn't he? Most people just wanna talk with schoolkids and the press and stuff and maybe put out a memoir when they're on the cusp of death, but he wants to make even more money off space. And I **HATE** it. I think that being an Astronaut (bona-fide, not space tourist like Virgin is trying to do) should be a humbling experience, not an experience to be made money off of, other than the pay you get from the agency for being up there.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-10T17:54:04Z" title="08/10/2015 05:54  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 10, 2015</time> by Flymetothemun**
Have you considered the possibility he's doing it because he enjoys it and wants to produce music...?

> 
> Have you considered the possibility he's doing it because he enjoys it and wants to produce music...?

Yeah, about that...

I just woke up when I wrote that, I could barely think, and I am, to say the least, ornery. To use an expression, all my cylinders weren't firing. Just move on...

it might appear unrelated but. 

I spent the last week end with 80+ elders playings Yahtzee and scrabble. 

Also i showed them the ISS live stream, and where is the iss right now, they not even heard about.

You should have seen there eyes. Not sure about "kid react to ..." ; but "Elders react to iss live" is kinda something too ; ) At least some songs might help to share the show on purposes ; )

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T06:46:57Z" title="08/11/2015 06:46  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**

Off topic but WinkAllKerb not to sound mean but when did your English skills get that good? Wow good job man!

On topic. I'm looking forward to this is, as long as the quality is on par with his Space Oddity video I will be happy!
